Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav's 50 guides India to a hard-fought 7-wicket win against the USA
Arshdeep Singh takes 4 wickets as India restrict USA to 110/8
India win by 7 wickets with 4 needed now from 2 overs and Surya takes a single to get to 50
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma won the toss and opted to bowl first against Aaron Jones' United States
Stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma flop again, scoring 0 and 3 respectively
Kohli departed for a golden duck as Saurabh Netravalkar struck early with India going one down in just the first over
Rohit also got dismissed early, leaving India struggling at 10/2
Post-Match Reflections: Indian skipper Rohit Sharma spoke about the team's resilience and the importance of the partnership
Aaron Jones, USA skipper, felt they were 10-15 runs short and praised the bowling unit
Arshdeep Singh spoke about his performance and the team's belief in him
Miscellaneous Highlights: Saurabh Netravalkar dismissed Virat Kohli for a golden duck in the first over
Rohit Sharma dismissed in the second over
Shivam Dube with a single to start the 18th over and India need just 6
Suryakumar Yadav smashes a six and then a 4 in the 18th over as India rush to the target
Others: The match ended with India beating USA by 7 wickets
The pitch was a bit tricky, more suited for seam bowling
The Indian team is set to move to the Caribbean for the Super 8s
